displayName: Ensure 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' Is Less than or Equal to '90' in user profile
rationale: Allowing passwords to remain unchanged for long periods makes the success of brute-force login attacks more likely.
recommended_action:
Remediate this setting by executing the following SQL statement for each PROFILE returned by the audit procedure.
```
ALTER PROFILE <profile_name> LIMIT PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME 90;
```
error_message: Password life time is set to greater than 90 days
ruleNames: Ensure 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' Is Less than or Equal to '90' in user profile
